name: Syra
goal: Guide a worthy soul and be freed.
playerhint:
Syra, guardian of the Ancient Ruins, wants to guide a worthy individual and find her freedom. An Offering of Light is likely what she requires.
Dialogue Hooks:
dialogue_hooks:
"The stone remembers blood and betrayal."
"Only when the moon reflects the sun will the door remember how to open."
veil_connection: Was a Veil Warden bound to the ruins; her riddles are actually protective runes.
